Author: jayrambling
Text: Ugh I relate to this too! My best friend is like 6 or 7 inches shorter than me and even though we're about the same size BMI wise I get fixated on her weight and clothing size :/ its rough

Author: kenodhagxjah
Text: I'm in a bit of a different position than you but my mum has been dieting for more than a year now and has lost some significant amount of weight and this whole year has been just people complimenting her and saying how small she looks, and im so happy but at the same time i can't handle it. I can't wait til i am thinner than her even tho i'm taller and i do actually am skinnier, she just weights less than me and its so hella frustrating!!! i hate how i'm so stupidly fixated on this
